main event: Multiple witnesses observed mysterious lights in Ipswich, Massachusetts over three nights in August 1956.
interesting points: The lights were first seen by two observers, Edwin Damon and Russell Green, on the night of August 7,The lights reappeared on five occasions following the initial sighting,Green reported that the object changed shape from round to oblong as he watched it until 2:45 a.m., The object was described as a solid, brilliantly lighted object that moved rapidly,The sightings were reportedly being scrutinized by the Eastern Air Defense Command.
witness description: first observed by Edwin Damon and Russell Green, later by two more neighbors
